SpiraSketch

Use the control panel on the right to create unique spiral patterns.

Drawings are created by linking "spinners" of varying lengths (denoted as the "radii" in control panel) and moving at different relative speeds (denoted as the "ratio" in the control panel).

Get started easily with the "Randomize!" buttons. Or, go ahead and make your own patterns by customizing the number of rotors, radii, and ratio.

Click anywhere to get started.
